alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Hemphill; Hutchinson; Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 9:35PM CDT until September 10 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Hansford County in the Panhandle of Texas... Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 934 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Wolf Creek Park to 7 miles south of Waka, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. At 930 PM CDT, automated weather equipment recorded a 62 mph wind gust at the Spearman airport. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Spearman, Canadian, Miami, Wolf Creek Park, Lora, Farnsworth, Waka, and Codman. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Hansford; Hemphill; Hutchinson; Lipscomb; Ochiltree; Roberts
